item.title: Solomon Brothers Company Issues Claim Notice to Suspected 'Abandoned' Bitcoin Wallet Holder
item.description: On August 7th, according to the report of CoinDesk, the revived investment bank Solomon Brothers announced that it has completed the process of inserting an OP_Return notification into a bitcoin wallet regarded as "abandoned", advising holders to claim the assets as soon as possible.Based on its official website, wallets that have not been used for more than 14 years may be considered "legally abandoned", which has triggered discussions in the community about its potential forfeiture methods. Some comments described its actions as "clever but controversial". The company has sent notifications to some well-known addresses, such as the "1Feex" wallet holding 80,000 BTC.Solomon Brothers stated that its anonymous client plans to set up a special fund to assist wallet holders who have lost their private keys, and the details will be announced in the coming months. Wallet holders are given a 90-day deadline to claim the wallet through a transfer or by filling out a form. Some users have

item.title: A whale liquidated its 4943 ETH holdings held for 8 months, realizing a profit of $1.65 million.
item.description: August 7th. According to Ashes Monitor, a whale purchased 4943 ETH with an average price of $3459 in December 2024. After holding it for 8 months, it sold all 4943 ETH today at an average price of $3794, achieving a profit of $1.65 million.

item.title: White House Press Secretary: Trump to Sign Executive Order Today Allowing 401(k) Retirement Fund Investment in Cryptocurrency
item.description: On August 7th, the White House Press Secretary, Levitt, declared that Trump is scheduled to sign an executive order on this day, enabling 401(k) retirement funds to make investments in cryptocurrency.

item.title: Market News: Ripple to Invest $200 Million to Acquire Stablecoin Platform Rail
item.description: July 8. Per market insiders, Ripple is set to acquire the stablecoin platform Rail at a cost of $200 million.

item.title: In the week ending August 2, initial jobless claims in the United States were 226,000, compared to the expected 221,000.
item.description: On August 7th in the United States, the initial jobless claims for the week that ended on August 2nd were 226,000. This figure was compared to the expected 221,000. (FXStreet)

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 Closes $2.51M Loss on BTC Short, Turns to Short ETH
item.description: On August 7th, as per Ember Monitor, the "Insider Trader" @qwatio liquidated all his BTC short position on Hyperliquid, incurring a loss of $2.51 million following the rally triggered by President Trump signing an executive order. Subsequently, he transferred the remaining $475,000 of his initial capital from Hyperliquid to GMX to take a short position in ETH. He established a short position with a nominal value of $26.36 million in ETH at an average price of $3,809, and the liquidation price was $3,854.

item.title: SharpLink Gaming has conducted a targeted issuance of $200 million for funding, which will be used to increase its ETH holdings.
item.description: On August 7th, according to official information, SharpLink Gaming declared that it had raised $200 million through a private placement. The issuance price was $19.50 per share, and it was led by four global institutional investors. This round of fundraising will be utilized to expand the company's Ethereum (ETH) reserves. It is anticipated that after full implementation, the Ethereum asset size of SharpLink Gaming will exceed $2 billion.

item.title: Robinhood will list FLOKI spot trading
item.description: On August 7th, as per an official announcement, Robinhood is going to list FLOKI for spot trading.

item.title: Tether Acquires Minority Stake in Bit2Me and Leads €30 Million Funding Round
item.description: On August 7th, as per an official announcement, Tether has made an announcement regarding the acquisition of a minority stake in the digital asset platform Bit2Me and has taken the lead in a €30 million financing round, which is expected to be completed in the coming weeks. This financing will be utilized to support Bit2Me's expansion within the European Union and to enhance its business operations in Latin America, particularly in Argentina.Previously, Bit2Me became the first Spanish-speaking cryptocurrency asset service provider to receive authorization from the National Securities Market Commission (CNMV) of Spain and to comply with the requirements of the European Union's Markets in Crypto-Assets regulations (MiCA). With the MiCA license, Bit2Me is legally able to operate in all 27 EU member states.

item.title: Robinhood will list ONDO spot trading
item.description: Update: On August 7th, as per an official announcement, Robinhood is going to list ONDO for spot trading.
